subject: Question about import duties and VAT - European Union
description_text:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am located in Hungary and have a question about import duties and taxes.
I'm interested in buying the Simsonn Plus X + VAM motors from your website
directly as it offers a better deal than getting it through other retails
like amazon for example.

Your FAQ says over 150 € purchases have import duties if it ships from
outside the EU. Is there any way to figure out if the pedals would be
shipped from inside the EU or not?
And another question is the VAT included in the price or not?

Thank you!
Daniel

conversations.body_text: Hi Dániel Gönczi,  Our Plus X pedals can be shipped from Germany. I will check tomorrow whether VAM Germany has them in stock; otherwise, VAM will ship from China.
Hi Dániel Gönczi,    Our German warehouse holds stock of pedals and Vam haptics, so please feel free to purchase.  Merry Christmas!

Thank you for the answer and happy holidays to you too!

Daniel

> 2025. dec. 24. dátummal, 12:18 időpontban service@simsonn.com írta:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Dániel Gönczi,
> 
> Our German warehouse holds stock of pedals and Vam haptics, so please feel free to purchase.
> Merry Christmas!
